title: Unable to ban
body: Twice in a row now I have joined a ranked queue and been able to choose my intent, but when it comes to my turn for banning a champion the ban button doesnt light up and I cant press it, no matter which champion i click on. I have lost LP and now have to wait 30min to queue up again, I play everyday and there has never been a problem.

replies.body: You should submit a ticket rather then posting it on the boards. At least if you submit a ticket Riot are definitely going to see it.
